projects.title: Nemmadi Dairy Farm Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive dairy farm management platform designed to streamline operations, including staff attendance with facial recognition, milk yield tracking, inspection reports, and purchase approvals. Built for efficiency, scalability, and role-based access control.
